Mod1_Description: {c_important}Shred{/c} has an additional {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance against Poisoned enemies.
Mod2_Description: Each slash with {c_important}Shred{/c} Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_8]){/c} when it deals damage.
name: Shred
simple_desc: Leap onto an enemy and slash them.
